title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Election) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 4) Order, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 211
Gazette dated Thursday, 30th April, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 43 OF 2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 4) Order, 2020
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the Electoral
Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Election) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 4)
Order, 2020.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and ward Date and
time of
set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the returning
nominations
officer on Tuesday, 19th May, 2020, between 09:00 hours and for elections
15:00 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Tuesday, 19th May, Campaign
2020 at 15:00 hours and close at 18:00 hours on Monday, 8th June, period
2020.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a councilor in a district and Election date
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Tuesday, 9th June, and time of
poll
2020, between 06:00 hours and 18:00 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K4.00 each
212 Statutory Instruments 30th April, 2020
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs 2 and 4)
ELECTION FOR COUNCILLORS
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Chilubi Chilubi 107001004 Bulilo
Mongu Nalikwanda 110007016 Nakato
Mongu Nalikwanda 110007019 Imalyo
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 22nd day of April, 2020.
J. E. CHILU,
Chairperson
A. C. NHEKAIRO,
Vice-Chairperson
E. J. SIKAZWE,
Member
A.D. SIMWINGA,
LUSAKA Member
22nd April, 2020
[EC/101/5/5 CONF.]
